entry.title: Call for Papers: QSE-NE 2024 - First International Workshop on Quantum Software Engineering: The Next Evolution

link.title: Call for Papers: QSE-NE 2024 - First International Workshop on Quantum Software Engineering: The Next Evolution

entry.content:
I am thrilled to announce the Call for Papers for the First International Workshop on Quantum Software Engineering: The Next Evolution (QSE-NE), happening in co-located with the ACM International Conference on the Foundations of Software Engineering (FSE) 2024.

Details:

  • Workshop webpage: QSE-NE Workshop
  • FSE 2024: Conference Details

The workshop aims to bring together leading researchers and practitioners in the field of Quantum Software Engineering, providing a platform for discussions that will propel this rapidly evolving field forward.

Important Dates:

  • April 10, 2024: Paper submission deadline
  • April 30, 2024: Authorsâ€™ notification
  • May 17, 2024: Camera-ready papers
  • July 15, 2024: Workshop takes place

Submission Guidelines:

For the QSE-NE 2024 workshop, we welcome the following types of submissions:

  • Research Track (up to 10 pages): Original research papers focusing on innovative methodologies, tools, datasets, or studies aligned with the workshop themes.

  • Ideas, Visions, and Reflections Track (up to 4 pages): Submissions proposing radical ideas, pioneering research directions, or offering insightful reflections and lessons from past experiences.

  • Industry Track (up to 4 pages): Papers addressing practical industrial challenges and experiences, emphasizing real-world problems, practical insights, and lessons learned from industrial practices.

Authors are invited to submit original unpublished research papers and industrial practice papers. Simultaneous submissions to other conferences are not permitted. At least one author of accepted papers must register for the workshop to have their papers included in the FSE companion proceedings.

Please submit your papers in PDF format here.
entry.summary: Explore the frontiers of Quantum Software Engineering at QSE-NE 2024, co-located with ACM FSE 2024.
